pageProduct.name: Scholl Gel Toe & Finger Protector Pain Relief
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Scholl Toe & Finger Gel Protector provides cushioning protection with Gelactiv/Soft Gel Technology for immediate relief from pressure & rubbing.

How is the Scholl Gel & toe Finger Protector different?


Scholl Gel Toe & Finger Protector provides relief from soreness.


 


What are the benefits?


 - Ideal for sore fingers, toes, corns and blisters


 - Soft and conformable for optimum comfort


 - Can be cut into required length


 


Gelactiv/Soft Gel Technology

Suitable For: Sore fingers, toes, corns and blisters

Boxed Contents: 1 Pack

Size: 1 Pack

Reusable?: true

Warnings

Keep out of reach of children. Avoid using on cracked or broken skin. If seal on pack is broken, do not use.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Please seek advice before use if you have diabetes as your foot condition may require treatment by a healthcare professional.

Directions

Adjust to desired length with scissors and apply on finger or toe. Remove for at least 3-4 hours a day to let skin breathe.

USAGE ADVICE

Washing InstructionsHand wash with mild soap and lukewarm water. Rinse thoroughly then leave to dry naturally. Dust with talc when dry.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool, dry place out of direct sunlight.

Storage Temperature: Store below 25°C.

Washable?: true
